say.name: GROCER:
say.says: Hey there stranger. How was your vacation?

say.name: YOU:
say.says: Probably about as good as your vacation.

say.name: GROCER:
say.says: Yeah, but my stint wasn't nearly as long as yours. What are you doing back?

say.name: YOU:
say.says: I'm here to find Kate, I was hoping you knew where she went.

say.name: GROCER:
say.says: Well, even if I did I'm not sure anyone in the town trusts you. Myself included.

say.name: YOU:
say.says: I'm not looking for forgiveness, just trying to find my sister.

say.name: GROCER:
say.says: Yeah I know. Look, I can help you out, but you gotta help me too.

say.name: YOU:
say.says: What did you have in mind?

say.name: GROCER:
say.says: Well, you could help stock the store.
